sentences: The meeting, held from 25-29 March 2014 in Yokohama, Japan, focused on finalizing the WGII contribution to AR5 titled 'Climate Change 2013: Impacts, Adaptation and Vulnerability'.
The Panel then met to approve the WGII SPM and accepted the underlying report, including the Technical Summary and annexes.
enb_long_title: Twelfth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Working Group III (WGIII-12) and Thirty-ninth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-39)
